Additionally, the market's overall turbulence, driven by global trade tensions and fears of an economic recession, compounded the...

importantArticles.headline: Bank of America (NYSE: BAC) has been a much better investment than Toronto-Dominion Bank (NYSE: TD) over the past decade.  In fact, Bank of America's stock price return alone is better than TD Bank's total return, which includes reinvested dividends.  Over the past decade, Bank of America has increased its dividend each and every year.
importantArticles.title: Bank of America vs. TD Bank: Which Dividend Giant Provides Greater Value?

importantArticles.headline: Bank stocks fell sharply after President Trump unveiled sweeping tariffs that some feared would hurt loan growth and quality.  JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America dropped, as did U.S. Bancorp, PNC Financial Services, Truist Financial and Fifth Third.  Higher prices from tariffs could weigh on loan growth at banks and cause borrowers to fall behind on payments.
importantArticles.title: Bank Stocks Fall After Tariff Announcements
